text.altSub: Alternatively, you could switch to a monthly plan at $2.99/month.

text.aOffer: Get 2 months for free when you subscribe for a year!
text.canCancel: . You can cancel your subscription at any time.
text.cancelQuest: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription?
text.highScore: YOU GOT A NEW HIGH SCORE
text.maybe: MAY BE YOU NEED A BIT MORE
text.mOffer: You're currently getting 2 months for free with your annual plan.  You will loose this discount if you switch to a monthly plan.
text.mSubscribe: Get unlimited lives and unlock a world of geography knowledge for the price of a latte!
text.notFinish: You may not be able to finish this game if you get more than #n# questions wrong.
text.playAgain: You can explore articles and content but not play any games until you have lives again
text.quitText: Are you sure you want to quit?
text.renew: Your subscription will automatically be renewed on
text.resubscribe: You can subscribe again at any time. You can still use the app but have limited lives.
text.rni: The Rate of Natural Increase (RNI) is based on which factors?
text.subject: Subject
text.watchAnAd: Watch an ad to get an extra life!
text.wontLoose: Try again. You won't loose a life.
